input.label: Select an Application:
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism | stats dc by appName, appId

table.title: Request Volume by App Version
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=VolumeByAppVersion" appName=$appName$ |head 1| rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+)" max_match=50| eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as APP_VERSION, RATE as REQUEST_VOLUME | table APP_VERSION,REQUEST_VOLUME

table.title: Request Volume by Device
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DailyVolumeByDevice" appName=$appName$ |head 1| rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+)" max_match=50| eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as DEVICE, RATE as REQUEST_VOLUME | table DEVICE,REQUEST_VOLUME

table.title: Request Volume by OS
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DailyVolumeByOS" appName=$appName$ |head 1| rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+)" max_match=50| eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as OS, RATE as REQUEST_VOLUME | table OS,REQUEST_VOLUME

table.title: DAU by AppVersion
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DauByAppVersion" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as APP_VERSION, RATE as DAU | table APP_VERSION,DAU

table.title: App Loads By App Version
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=LoadsByAppVersion" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as APP_VERSION, RATE as LOADS | table APP_VERSION,LOADS

table.title: User Base By App Version
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=LoadsByAppVersion" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as APP_VERSION, RATE as LOADS | eventstats sum(LOADS) as TOTAL | eval PERCENTAGE = LOADS/TOTAL| table APP_VERSION,PERCENTAGE

table.title: Crashes by App Version
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=CrashByAppVersion" appName=$appName$ |head 1| rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+)" max_match=50| eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as OS, RATE as CRASHES | table OS,CRASHES

table.title: Crash Percentage by App Version
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=CrashPerByAppVersion" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as APP_VERSION, RATE as CRASH_PERCENTAGE | table APP_VERSION,CRASH_PERCENTAGE

table.title: App Loads by Device
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApploadsByDevice" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as DEVICE, RATE as LOADS | table DEVICE,LOADS

table.title: User Base by Device
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApploadsByDevice" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as DEVICE, RATE as LOADS | eventstats sum(LOADS) as TOTAL | eval PERCENTAGE = LOADS/TOTAL| table DEVICE,PERCENTAGE

table.title: Crashes by Device
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=CrashesByDevice" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as DEVICE, RATE as CRASHES | table DEVICE,CRASHES

table.title: Crash Percentage by Device
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=CrashPerByDevice" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as DEVICE, RATE as CRASH_PERCENTAGE | table DEVICE,CRASH_PERCENTAGE

table.title: App Loads by OS
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApploadsByOs" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as OS, RATE as APP_LOADS | table OS,APP_LOADS

table.title: User Base by OS
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApploadsByOs" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as OS, RATE as LOADS | eventstats sum(LOADS) as TOTAL | eval PERCENTAGE = LOADS/TOTAL| table OS,PERCENTAGE

table.title: Crashes by OS
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DailyCrashesByOs" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as OS, RATE as CRASHES | table OS,CRASHES

table.title: Crash Percentage by OS
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=CrashPerByOs" appName=$appName$ |head 1 | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d*[.]?\d+)" max_match=50 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<SERVICE>.*?),(?<RATE>\d*[.]?\d+)"|sort -RATE | rename SERVICE as OS, RATE as CRASH_PERCENTAGE | table OS,CRASH_PERCENTAGE
